overview:
Srideep (Sri) is the marketing consultant at TestPlant.He joined TestPlant as digital marketing consultant in October 2009, after serving as the inside-sales and market research team lead at worlds largest independent testing services company AppLabs.

During his three years at AppLabs he recruited and trained a global market intelligence team that pursued high value QA services projects across the globe. During this time he contributed in establishing marketing campaign calenders, KPI reports in the inside sales team at AppLabs. He was the champ of the month for 10 consecutive months (2009) for successfully introducing AppLabs services in FTSE 100 companies.In 2006 he received the highest honor given to a AppLabs employee, the Kairos Award, in recognition of his contribution for developing an in-house email marketing analytic tool.

He started his career as a media space selling officer with Bennett Coleman and Co Ltd [Bennett Coleman and Co Ltd] (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/TheTimesGroup) responsible for brands like The Times of India and Financial Times as well as developing event concepts and conceptualizing new media products.
